misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
description: The URL class in Java is not a secure way to handle URLs. It does not provide any built-in security features, such as SSL/TLS, which is required to protect against man-in-the-middle attacks.
recommendation: Use a secure URL library, such as Apache HTTP Client or Spring Web, which provides built-in SSL/TLS support and other security features.
